Comment: Cleaner coordination workflow - contacts cleaners in rank order until one confirms

CompareCleanerIndex.Comment: Check if current index is beyond cleaner list

GetCurrentCleaner.Comment: Get the current cleaner from the list

SendCleanerRequest.Comment: Send email to cleaner requesting availability

Text.Data:
States.Format('Hello {},

We have a new booking for {} and need a cleaning and laundry turnover.

Details:
- Date: {}
- Time: 2:00 PM
- Address: {}
- Estimated Duration: {}

Are you available on {} at 2:00 PM to do a cleaning and laundry turnover at {}?

Please reply with "yes" or "no".

Thank you,
RentalTurnManager', $.state.currentCleaner.cleaner.name, $.state.input.property.metadata.propertyName, States.ArrayGetItem(States.StringSplit($.state.input.cleaningDateTime, 'T'), 0), $.state.input.property.address, $.state.input.property.metadata.cleaningDuration, States.ArrayGetItem(States.StringSplit($.state.input.cleaningDateTime, 'T'), 0), $.state.input.property.address)

WaitForResponse.Comment: Wait for cleaner response (in production, this would be replaced with a callback pattern)

CheckResponsePlaceholder.Comment: Placeholder for checking cleaner response - in production this would check email replies

CleanerConfirmed.Comment: Send confirmation to cleaner and notification to owner

IncrementCleanerIndex.Comment: Move to next cleaner in list

Subject.Data: States.Format('URGENT: Unable to Schedule Cleaning for {} on {}', $.state.input.property.metadata.propertyName, States.ArrayGetItem(States.StringSplit($.state.input.cleaningDateTime, 'T'), 0))

WorkflowFailed.Cause: All cleaners in the list were contacted but none confirmed availability
